DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 1, randomized, placebo-controlled, double-blind, healthy volunteer study tested the safety, tolerability, and plasma pharmacokinetics of two different concentrations of TAT4 Gel administered once daily to 50 cm2 of skin for 14 days.
DOC.brief_title: Phase 1 Study to Assess the Safety and Tolerability of TAT4 Gel in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Men and women 4070 years old Healthy volunteers Provision of informed consent History of skin hypersensitivity Abnormality on screening assessments
